GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object with its keys

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, and able use the available queries

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object of the article found by the id with all it's keys

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array with all it's comments by article id and able to query by limit and page (p)

POST /api/articles.description: inserts a new article and returns the new article with all its keys

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object with all it's keys
